description: This file defines the Express.js routes for managing products, including listing, retrieving details, creating, updating, and deleting products. It includes Swagger API documentation comments for each route and uses middleware for authentication and authorization.

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines GET /products route to list products

methods.name: router.get
methods.description: Defines GET /products/:id route to get product details

methods.name: router.post
methods.description: Defines POST /products route to create a new product with auth and admin guards

methods.name: router.put
methods.description: Defines PUT /products/:id route to update a product with auth and admin guards

methods.name: router.delete
methods.description: Defines DELETE /products/:id route to delete a product with auth and admin guards
